name: Dire Wolf
description: The Dire Wolf resembles a larger, more aggressive version of a wolf, with thick fur, muscular limbs, and a powerful build. It stands as tall as a horse at the shoulder.
memorable: Its ability to knock targets prone and coordinate attacks in packs makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: To hunt prey and dominate its territory alongside its pack.
relations: Often found with other wolves as a pack hunter.
strengths: High movement speed and powerful melee attacks; excellent at tracking with keen senses.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magic and ranged attacks despite decent hit points.
attacks: Relies on its powerful bite to deal significant piercing damage and can knock enemies prone.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics, allowing advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and smell, granting advantage on relevant perception checks.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, useful for ambushing foes.
additional_information: Can be heard howling from great distances
Forms strong social bonds within its pack
Uses its size and strength to dominate territory
Effective predator when attacking in numbers
Can snap bones with its powerful jaws
test_queries: large aggressive wolf with powerful bite
fearsome predator that hunts in packs
wolf that knocks foes prone with its bite
quick moving wolf found in the wilderness
wolf with keen senses and ambushing tactics
